Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Tigers play the Cleveland Guardians on Wednesday with their best-of-five AL Division Series tied at one game apiece, ending a drought that has dragged on since 2014.

Alex Cobb, who last appeared in the playoffs in 2013, made his season debut on August 9 and was sidelined after two games by a torn nail on his right index finger. He then went back on the injured list with a blister on his right middle finger.
Detroit used seven pitchers to eliminate AL West champion Houston to finish a two-game wild card sweep for its first postseason series win since 2013.
